sources.title: Merger of Teladoc and Livongo reflects wider telehealth trend
sources.snippet: Both stocks initially fell after the deal was announced last week, due to concerns about the high price of the deal and the integration risks involved in merging the companies. Teladoc fell 19% to $202.01, and Livongo dropped 11% to $128.06. While they have yet to bounce back, they've still chalked up strong gains in the year to date.
